report.title: EBMS Summary Level Download Report
report.description: Lists saved samples. Normally invoked from download bar on annual summary page.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN (sample_attributes sa JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_attribute_id = sa.id AND sav.deleted = false) ON sa.caption = 'Recorder Name' AND sa.deleted = false AND sav.sample_id = parent.id JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav ON oav.deleted = false AND oav.occurrence_id = o.id #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY ctt.term, l.name, l.centroid_sref, date, parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, sav.text_value, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, common, cttl.preferred_taxon #order_by#
report.field_sql: ctt.term as site_type, l.name as site_name, l.centroid_sref as sref, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, sav.text_value as recorder, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, cttl.preferred_taxon as preferred, SUM(oav.int_value) as total
